topic.title: Registering SUSE Linux during Automated Deployment

section.title: Registering during Automated Deployment
section.p: If you deploy your instances automatically using AutoYaST, you can regsiter the system during the installation by providing the respective information in the AutoYaST control file. Refer to https://www.suse.com/documentation/sles-12/book_autoyast/data/createprofile_register.html for details.
